description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Meep - The strive for height, is an addictive nobrainer classic game. With simple controls and cute graphics, you control Meep - the ever jumping - from ledge to legde in the strive for height. Get as high up in the air as possible to make it onto the HighScore table and beat your friends!
